metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2157 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability inmod/assign/adminmanageplugins.php in Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before2.7.13, 2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators forrequests that manage Assignment plugins.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
